Text.Value: *You cannot make sense of this complex machine.*
*Its technology is far beyond anything you have ever seen - you will need more than magic or steel to destroy it.*
Warning. System failure. Warning.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: shot over players shoulders of them doing something to the switchboard

Text.Value: Focus on the centre of the Neurocitor - the perfect place for the runepowder bomb.
Carefully place the bomb.
*You fumble the input code - locking yourself out of the Neurocitor.*
*The Neurocitor is a mix of Gondian ingenuity and illithid cruelty.*
Leave.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player carefully places the rune powder bomb on the neurocitor.

Text.Value: Leave.
*The Neurocitor is the epicentre of the Steel Watch, controlling and connecting every single Watcher in the city.*
*Successfully inputting this will destroy the foundry - wiping it from the face of the Forgotten Realms.*
Attempt to decipher the symbols.
*The machine doesn't respond.*
*This will destroy the foundry - wiping it from the face of the Forgotten Realms.*
Amidst unfamiliar script you see Gnomish. Use it to decipher the other symbols.
*The Neurocitor awaits your input.*
Call upon your knowledge of ancient scripts to decipher the symbols.
Recall the code Toobin shared with you.
Press a button.
Input code 'Nebelun', and increase the Neurocitor's output to maximum.

Synopsis: The player interacts with the neural switchboard and attempts to trigger an explosion.
